title: Show Debates Their Most Unpopular Opinions + Lunchbox Gives Update On Reading Bible Verse At Wedding
itunes:title: Show Debates Their Most Unpopular Opinions + Lunchbox Gives Update On Reading Bible Verse At Wedding
description:
The show shares and debates all of their most unpopular opinions. Lunchbox gives an update on the bible reading he was assigned to do at his brother-in-law’s wedding. Also, the Girl Group gives advice to a listener in a difficult situation.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
